text:
The first batch of Disaster Management Training for National Cadet Corps (NCC) officers commenced at the 04 Battalion of National Disaster Response Force (NDRF), Arakkonam on Thursday.

The training, which will go on till January 30, was inaugurated by R. Nambiar, senior commandant of 04 BN NDRF.

A total of 18 NCC officers – 15 from Tamil Nadu and three from Kerala are participating in the training programme, a press release said. — Staff Reporter
title: NDRF training for NCC officers
